Safe Web for kids

Do you know what your children browse with your iOS device?

Safe Web is a web browser for iOS devices. It is based on whitelist tech which only allows to navigate to the websites of your choose.

 

Safe Web for kids

Do you know what your children browse with your iOS device?

Safe Web is a web browser for iOS devices. It is based on whitelist tech which only allows to navigate to the websites of your choose.
